name: Märchen Kanna
description:
More about Marchenkanna

・The RPG that travels through a world with a picture book-like ambience.
　Developed by one person, including graphics and music.

・The story takes place in a peaceful world where wizards live.
　The whole picture of the world is gradually revealed. What is hidden in the shadows?

・ In battle scenes, an unusual system that specifies the shape and range of attacks according to the placement of enemies.
　You can think about it carefully, or you don't have to think about it. It can be enjoyed by beginners and gamers alike!

・It takes about 5~6 hours to clear. There is no scenario branching, so you can play easily and quickly.
　Please enjoy this work with a lot of fun and excitement.


Other

・ There are some slightly shocking scenes!
(Contains horror elements, anxiety expressions, mild gore expressions, expressions related to suicide, expressions reminiscent of war, and scenes in which weapons are used)

・ Permission is not required for the act of earning money through play video distribution, etc. Please feel free to do so.

・All can be played for free. There are no plans to add paid content.
